medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain accompanied by nausea, vomiting, severe cramping, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began the evening of ___ with nausea and vomiting, followed by severe abdominal cramping and diarrhea, described as the worst the patient has ever experienced. Patient noted a fever in the 100-101's. Symptoms persisted over the next day; patient presented to the hospital after not feeling much better.
medical_history.past_medical_history: COPD, Coronary artery disease, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Diabetes Mellitus complicated by neuropathy and nephropathy, Abdominal aortic aneurysm, Renal artery stenosis, Anemia, B12 deficiency, Depression, Gout.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with colon cancer, Father with DM and history of CVA, Mother with Parkinson's, Son with asthma and type II DM.
